glsa.title: phpBB: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in phpBB, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML.

background.p: phpBB is an Open Source bulletin board package.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in phpBB. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to change settings, inject arbitrary web script or HTML, or conduct cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo Security support has been discontinued due to phpBB being dropped to unstable. As such, we recommend that users unmerge phpBB:
NOTE: Users could alternatively upgrade to “>=www-apps/phpBB-3.1.10”, however, these packages are not currently marked stable.
